properties.name: accountName
properties.description: Name of the account. If a record with this account name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

properties.name: Account_Site
properties.description: Name of the account’s location, e.g. Headquarters or London

properties.name: Account_Type
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: Currency
properties.description: Symbol of the currency in which revenue is generated

properties.name: Employees
properties.description: Number of employees in the account’s company

properties.name: Exchange_Rate
properties.description: Exchange rate of the default currency to the home currency

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: ID of the account to delete. Can be found at the end of the URL.

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create an account

properties.name: Create or Update
properties.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete an account

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get an account

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many accounts

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update an account

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Name of the contact’s assistant

properties.name: Department
properties.description: Company department to which the contact belongs

properties.name: Asst_Phone
properties.description: Phone number of the contact’s assistant

properties.name: Title
properties.description: Position of the contact at their company

properties.name: contactId
properties.description: ID of the contact to delete

properties.name: dealName
properties.description: Name of the deal. If a record with this deal name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

properties.name: Lead_Conversion_Time
properties.description: Average number of days to convert the lead into a deal

properties.name: Next_Step
properties.description: Description of the next step in the sales process

properties.name: Overall_Sales_Duration
properties.description: Average number of days to convert the lead into a deal and to win the deal

properties.name: Probability
properties.description: Probability of deal closure as a percentage. For example, enter 12 for 12%.

properties.name: Sales_Cycle_Duration
properties.description: Average number of days for the deal to be won

properties.name: dealId
properties.description: ID of the deal to delete

properties.name: Stage
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: subject
properties.description: Subject or title of the invoice

properties.name: Adjustment
properties.description: Adjustment in the grand total, if any

properties.name: Grand_Total
properties.description: Total amount for the product after deducting tax and discounts

properties.name: Sales_Commission
properties.description: Commission of sales person on deal closure as a percentage. For example, enter 12 for 12%.

properties.name: Sub_Total
properties.description: Total amount for the product excluding tax

properties.name: Tax
properties.description: Tax amount as the sum of sales tax and value-added tax

properties.name: Terms_and_Conditions
properties.description: Terms and conditions associated with the invoice

properties.name: invoiceId
properties.description: ID of the invoice to delete

properties.name: Subject
properties.description: Subject or title of the invoice

properties.name: Company
properties.description: Company at which the lead works

properties.name: Designation
properties.description: Position of the lead at their company

properties.name: Industry_Type
properties.description: Type of industry to which the lead belongs

properties.name: Lead_Source
properties.description: Source from which the lead was created

properties.name: No_of_Employees
properties.description: Number of employees in the lead’s company

properties.name: leadId
properties.description: ID of the lead to delete

properties.name: Get Fields
properties.description: Get lead fields

properties.name: productName
properties.description: Name of the product. If a record with this product name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

properties.name: productId
properties.description: ID of the product to delete

properties.name: Carrier
properties.description: Name of the carrier

properties.name: Discount
properties.description: Discount applied to the purchase order. For example, enter 12 for 12%.

properties.name: PO_Date
properties.description: Date on which the purchase order was issued

properties.name: PO_Number
properties.description: ID of the purchase order after creating a case

properties.name: purchaseOrderId
properties.description: ID of the purchase order to delete

properties.name: Quote_Stage
properties.description: Stage of the quote. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: Team
properties.description: Team for whom the quote is created

properties.name: Valid_Till
properties.description: Date until when the quote is valid

properties.name: quoteId
properties.description: ID of the quote to delete

properties.name: SO_Number
properties.description: ID of the sales order after creating a case

properties.name: salesOrderId
properties.description: ID of the sales order to delete

properties.name: vendorName
properties.description: Name of the vendor. If a record with this vendor name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

properties.name: vendorId
properties.description: ID of the vendor to delete
